body:
Comment 3 by **mauro.dec**: 
I just logged in again to my RPi and I cannot reproduce it at all!

Yesterday I could reproduce it every single time I tried. What's odd is that nothing
seems to have changed in the RPi at all. It hasn't been rebooted, no procesess have been
started/killed, I am even testing everything in the same screen session!

Last night I also noticed this crash would also happen when running 'go version', not
only on this mercurial changeset, but on others too. I will re-try later today and see
what happens.
